p: Substitution on the phenyl ring in compound 16a with 4-CH 3 increased the cytotoxic activity against A2780 cells. On the other hand, significant decreases in cytotoxic activities of compound 16a against both MCF-7 and HT29 cell lines were observed on substitution with either 4-CH 3/Cl groups on the phenyl ring. Moreover, substitution with CH 3/Cl groups at the para-position of the phenyl ring in compound 16a was associated with decrease in selectivity towards the three cancer cell lines, Figure 6.
